plot: A secret agent couple are working together to find the man with the orange fruit. But what is the orange fruit? And are oranges the only fruit?
title: Oranges Are Not the Only Fruit
plot_es: A secret agent couple are working together to find the man with the orange fruit. But what is the orange fruit? And are oranges the only fruit?
original_name: Oranges Are Not the Only Fruit
plot_en: A secret agent couple are working together to find the man with the orange fruit. But what is the orange fruit? And are oranges the only fruit?
